long_description: The Lezyne Caddy Sack is a simple, reusable sack that can be used to carry all necessities, even smartphones, when you anticipate a little moisture outside. The Lezyne Caddy Sack is designed with PVC fabrics, welded seams and a rolled velcro closure for extreme water resistance. Wide opening makes it quick and easy to see and extract contents.
short_description: The Lezyne Caddy Sack is a simple, reusable sack that can be used to carry all necessities, even smartphones, when you anticipate a little moisture outside.
